communications.communication:
July 11, 2023

Patrick C. Lee
General Counsel
Plymouth County Sheriff
24 Long Pond Road
Plymouth, MA 02360

Dear Mr. Lee, 

This is a request under the Massachusetts Public Record Law (M.G.L. Chapter 66, Section 10). I am requesting that I be provided a copy of the following records: 

1. Any policies or procedures that dictate what educational and programmatic services are offered to Federal Detainees and ICE Detainees within Plymouth Sheriff’s custody.

2. Records that indicate what educational services (including but not limited to K-12 education, Special Education, Vocational Education, High School Equivalency, or post-secondary education), if any, were provided to federal detainees and ICE detainees  from January 2021 through the date that this request is responded to. We request records that show the age of the detainee who received educational services, and the type of educational services provided. If no educational services were provided during this time, a statement to that effect would be appreciated.


The Public Records law requires you to provide me with a written response within 10 business days.  I would appreciate an electronic response via email.  Thank you, in advance.

Sincerely, 

Joshua Dankoff
Director of Strategic Initiatives
Citizens for Juvenile Justice
44 School St. Suite 415,
Boston, MA 02108
617-338-1050

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: 2016 Huffman High School Gunfire Incident
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

The incident report including police narratives, produced in relation to the shooting incident at Huffman High School on 3/15/2016 located in 950 Springville Rd, Birmingham, AL 35215.

In the event that there are fees, I would request a waiver, as I am a member of a nonprofit media outlet and these records will be used in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

I would prefer the request filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.
